title: Recumbent at Rampage: What Can Go Wrong?
content:
Underbiking is one thing, but riding a recumbent on one of the original desert freeride zones just seemsâ€¦ sketch. In this video, Seth Stevens rides a recumbent bike down one of the original Red Bull Rampage sites.

The post Recumbent at Rampage: What Can Go Wrong? appeared first on The Radavist.
